overview:
Project Manager at Medical Billing India, Leading Medical Billing and Coding, Claim Processing Services Providing Company in India with operational centers in USA and other parts of the world.

About Medical Billing India (MBI)

Medical Billing India (MBI) has a proven track record of increasing collection in its total experience of more than 17 years of experience in assisting healthcare, medical, insurance professionals, companies, organizations, physicians, doctors, hospitals, OPD centers across countries like UK, USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Italy, France and other parts of the world.

MBI believes in implementing advance and customize medical billing and coding, insurance claim processing technologies, procedures to avoid billing misstates which is responsible for reduced cost paid to healthcare professionals and unnecessary audits.

Quick, complete and maximum reimbursements for its healthcare, medical service providing offshore clients it the priority for professional, certified and specialize medical billers and coders at MBI with 100% assured data security and confidentiality.

Offices & Locations

Hi-Tech House, B/H V-Murti Complex, Near Gurukul Tower, Gurukul, Ahmedabad-380 052, Gujarat, India. Voice (India): +91-794-000 3275

USA Address: 50 Riverside Drive, New York, NY 10024, USA

Email: info@medicalbilling-india.com Website: http://www.medicalbilling-india.com
